description: The Mango Mule is a refreshing drink that will hit the spot for both children and adults alike. It combines fresh mint, spicy ginger flavor with sweet mango to create this amazing tropical concoction!
name: Mango Mule

recipeInstructions.name: Combine cucumber, honey syrup and muddle.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine cucumber, honey syrup and muddle.

recipeInstructions.name: Add mango puree, lime juice and ginger beer. Stir well to combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: Add mango puree, lime juice and ginger beer. Stir well to combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill your glass with ice then pour the mixture into the glass to serve!
recipeInstructions.text: Fill your glass with ice then pour the mixture into the glass to serve!
